instanceFields.label: Position
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the position of the transform.

instanceFields.label: LocalPosition
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the local position of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Rotation
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the rotation of the transform.

instanceFields.label: LocalRotation
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the local rotation of the transform.

instanceFields.label: QuaternionRotation
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the quaternion rotation of the transform.

instanceFields.label: QuaternionLocalRotation
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the quaternion local rotation of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Scale
instanceFields.description: Gets or sets the scale of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Forward
instanceFields.description: Gets the forward vector of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Up
instanceFields.description: Gets the up vector of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Right
instanceFields.description: Gets the right vector of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Parent
instanceFields.description: Sets the parent of the transform

instanceFields.label: Name
instanceFields.description: Gets the name of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Layer
instanceFields.description: Gets the Physics Layer of the transform.

instanceFields.label: Animation
instanceFields.description: The Animation attached to this transform, returns null if there is none.

instanceFields.label: Animator
instanceFields.description: The Animator attached to this transform, returns null if there is none.

instanceFields.label: AudioSource
instanceFields.description: The AudioSource attached to this transform, returns null if there is none.

instanceMethods.label: GetTransform
instanceMethods.description: Gets the transform of the specified child.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the child transform to find.

instanceMethods.label: IsPlayingAnimation
instanceMethods.description: Checks if the given animation is playing.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to check.

parameters.name: anim
parameters.description: The name of the animation to play.

parameters.name: fade
parameters.description: The fade time in seconds for cross-fading (default: 0.1).

instanceMethods.label: GetAnimationLength
instanceMethods.description: Gets the length of the specified animation.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable or disable the particle emission.

instanceMethods.label: InverseTransformDirection
instanceMethods.description: Transforms a direction from world space to local space. Returns: The direction in local space.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction vector in world space.

instanceMethods.label: InverseTransformPoint
instanceMethods.description: Transforms a position from world space to local space. Returns: The position in local space.

instanceMethods.label: TransformDirection
instanceMethods.description: Transforms a direction from local space to world space. Returns: The direction in world space.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction vector in local space.

instanceMethods.label: TransformPoint
instanceMethods.description: Transforms a position from local space to world space. Returns: The position in world space.

instanceMethods.label: Rotate
instanceMethods.description: Rotates the transform by the given rotation in euler angles.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: The rotation in euler angles to apply.

instanceMethods.label: RotateAround
instanceMethods.description: Rotates the transform around a point by the given angle.

parameters.name: angle
parameters.description: The angle in degrees to rotate.

instanceMethods.label: LookAt
instanceMethods.description: Rotates the transform to look at the target position.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The world position to look at.

instanceMethods.label: SetRenderersEnabled
instanceMethods.description: Sets the enabled state of all child renderers.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enable or disable the renderers.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: If true, includes colliders from all children recursively (default: false).
